body:
I'm using rook1.4
when running tests I'm creating a cluster of 1 node.
before running the tests I'm validating that all pods are up and running
it seems that it tries to deploy more than one pod for the provisioner but since I have only one node it stays in pending state and therefor my test that validate all the pods are up fails and testing is not performed.
I couldn't find where can I set the number of pods
